t: Amazon.com : US Flag Store USA Banner 3ft x 5ft Polyester Flag - Online Stores Brand : Outdoor Flags : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: The USA banner flag is made from spun polyester, which is one of the most durable flag materials on the market. The open weave reduces fabric stress and resists high winds. These flags are the best choice if you fly the flag 24/7 and the flag is going to be flown in high windspeeds.
